Field MAN.STATUS.FLG will take priority to either Include or Exclude a portfolio for composite Performance. Field will be blank if there is no change to the Auto status suggested by system.

This field specifies whether a portfolio is either Included or Excluded for composite performance calculation.

If the field contains the status E (Exclude) and if the portfolio satisfies any of the exclusion rules defined at composite level, the performance of an excluded portfolio will not be considered while calculating composite performance.

If the field contains the status I (Include) and if the Portfolio does not satisfy any of the Exclusion rules specified at composite level, the performance of a portfolio with Include status will be considered for composite performance calculation.
